A "Dreamweaver" chair that allows users to design and create their own unique, immersive experiences through a combination of virtual and augmented reality technologies. A "TimeTraveler" chair that uses a combination of historical artifacts, interactive displays, and AI-powered storytelling to transport users through time and space.
